name: Ahavarion, Spear of Lycander
flavorText: "For love of the nephalem Philios, I will leave this weapon behind, and exchange the powers of Heaven for the peace of Sanctuary." –The angel Lycander
flavorTextHtml: "For love of the nephalem Philios, I will leave this weapon behind, and exchange the powers of Heaven for the peace of Sanctuary." –The angel Lycander

secondary.textHtml: Chance on killing a demon to gain a random Shrine effect.
